abstract: Liédson da Silva Muniz (born 17 December 1977), simply known as Liédson, is a professional footballer who plays as a striker.Nicknamed Levezinho ("Slender one") due to his light frame (only 63 kg), he spent the bulk of his career in Portugal representing Sporting, scoring nearly 200 goals in more than 300 official games, winning four major titles with the club and helping it to four Champions League participations.Born in Brazil, Liédson became a Portuguese citizen in 2009 and appeared with the national team at the 2010 World Cup, already in his 30s.

name: Liédson
